妋字的基本解释

妋
fū
贪貌。
女貌。

妋
yōu
脸上有恨意。

妋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fū］
［《廣韻》甫無切，平虞，非。］
(1)贪恋美貌。
(2)女子容貌。
[②]［yōu］
［《廣韻》於求切，平尤，影。］
眉宇间露出恨意。

妋字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妋； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页256第07
【廣韻】甫無切【集韻】風無切，?音玞。貪也。一曰女貌。　又【廣韻】【類編】?於求切，音憂。【同文舉要】恨也，眉目閒恨也。

妋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
妋字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fū］
["Guangyun" has no cut, Pingyu, non. ]
(1) Covetous beauty.
(2) Female appearance.
[②]［yōu］
["Guangyun" Yu Qiuqi, Pingyou, Ying. ]
There was hatred between the eyebrows.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妋; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 256 to 07
[Guang Yun] Fu has no cut [Ji Yun] The wind has no cut,? Sound. Greedy too. One is female appearance.　[Guang Yun] [Classification]? In seeking to cut, the sound is worried. [Tongwen Juyao] Hatred is also hate, and hate is also free.
